Articles.Content: I've been scouring for a place to find where the eve file for extrasolar is, ever since AndrewDraws removed the github page it has been impossible to get ahold of. I really need it because I based an entire project around the valentine system, and I would like it to look nice. It's a video idea, so I'll upload it when it's done.

You can find Extrasolar on spacedock still. It looks like it was removed in the 1.7.5 version. So you will need to DL the 1.7.3 version or older and look under the Optionals folder.

Edited April 27, 2019 by Barar
Mistaking Eve planet for EVE mod.

10 hours ago, Barar said:

You can find Extrasolar on spacedock still. It looks like it was removed in the 1.7.5 version. So you will need to DL the 1.7.3 version or older and look under the Optionals folder.

Alright, I'll give it a go

It doesn't work 1.6, so I guess I'd have to use an older version. Thanks a bunch my friend

Edited April 28, 2019 by Blyet Nye the Soviet Guy
added thank you
